name: IDEO
overview: [IDEO](http://www.ideo.com/) is a global design and innovation  consultancy firm.  Some of their clients include Procter & Gamble, Pepsi, [Microsoft](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/microsoft), [Nokia](http://www.nokia.com], [Intel](http://www.intel.com), Eli Lilly, [Samsung](http://www.samsung.com), and Steelcase.
